messages.subject: Freedom vs. neglect
messages.msgSnippet: I really think that I am missing something in the whole motherhood game because in all my years of being a mother I have yet to eat a bonbon. Geez Michelle!
messages.messageBody:
"I really think that I am missing something in the whole motherhood
game because in all my years of being a mother I have yet to eat a
bonbon."

Geez Michelle! Don't throw a wrench in the cogs...we've got this good
thing going here. Eat bonbons, tell the kids to go play, yeah, pretty
good gig. Then we call it unschooling so we don't look bad.

Disclaimer: *That was total sarcasm for anyone that might have an
under-developed sense of humor.*

Personally, I prefer truffles and tea, to bonbons and television. I've
been known to hide truffles in my desk, only to have them discovered
by my chocolate radar-equipped children. Alas, there are no safe
secret stashes here.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
